entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -19.4°C
Wind: SSE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
